images.description: This shows the hex-grid layout containing many of Levi's posts at random positions. This also captures a "lightning" animation in progress.
This shows the grid layout in its expanded form. After clicking on a tile with a post, the grid expands around that tile in order to show an enlarged panel with details about the post.
A dat.GUI menu makes most of the parameters in hex-grid dynamically configurable by the user. This is great for debugging, tuning, and playing around.
